title.oldValue: Microsoft 365 admin center: Adoption Score People Experiences -- Group level aggregates for Communication, Mobility Content Collaboration, and Meetings
title.newValue: Microsoft 365 admin center: Adoption Score People Experiences: Group level aggregates for Teamwork

description.oldValue: ,We are adding group level aggregates to Adoption Score people experiences for Meetings and Teamwork. Group information can be viewed across five Azure Active Directory attributes – Company, Department, Country, State and City. For group level aggregate information to be displayed, the capability must be enabled by a Global Administrator and a minimum of 10 users must be included in a group to ensure that individual users cannot be tracked.
description.newValue: ,We are adding group level aggregates to Adoption Score people experiences for Teamwork. Group information can be viewed across five Azure Active Directory attributes – Company, Department, Country, State and City. For group level aggregate information to be displayed, the capability must be enabled by a Global Administrator and a minimum of 10 users must be included in a group to ensure that individual users cannot be tracked.
